properties.areaDesc: NW Blount; Loudon; Northwest Cocke; North Sevier
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 9:38AM EST until February 8 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow developing. Snow accumulations of 1/2 to 1 inch but
localized up to 2 inches, mainly over grassy and elevated
surfaces but slushy snow covered secondary roadways are
possible.

* WHERE...Northwest Cocke, Loudon, Northwest Blount and North
Sevier Counties.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Slippery road conditions are possible across the
higher elevations and elevated surfaces, such as bridges and
overpasses.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
